Action.author: jimthematrix
Action.body: i'm able to reproduce this error. looking to see what's the problem.

Action.author: jimthematrix
Action.body: 127.0.0.1:47051: read: connection reset by peer 14:32:52.685 chaincode processStream -> ERRO 01d Got error: Incorrect number of arguments. Expecting 4 14:32:52.685 chaincode Launch -> ERRO 01e sending init failed(Error initializing container 7a67222df9b1cad80b8b2fa326aca8f715d13bf2beb2d9f8fa2285a40ec0a786: Incorrect number of arguments. Expecting 4) 14:32:52.726 chaincode processStream -> ERRO 01f Error handling chaincode support stream: connection error: desc = "transport is closing" 2016/09/09 14:33:41 grpc: Server.Serve failed to create ServerTransport: connection error: desc = "transport: write tcp 127.0.0.1:7051->127.0.0.1:47054: write: broken pipe" 2016/09/09 14:33:51 transport: http2Server.HandleStreams failed to receive the preface from client: read tcp 127.0.0.1:7051->127.0.0.1:47055: read: connection reset by peer >

Action.author: jimthematrix
Action.body: same error when using membersrvc and peer built from the master branch (still using node.js SDK @0.6)

Action.author: ratnakar
Action.body: Verified with hfc@0.61 and donot see the issue any more.
